title: Long Time No See, Dimwit
alternative_title: Long Time No See a Dim-Witted Guy ; Long Time No See, Dimwit ; Ri Jiu Jian Ren Que Xin Yan ; Quen Lâu Mới Biết Người Thiếu Tâm Cơ ; Rì Jiǔ Jiàn Rén Quē Xīn Yǎn ; 日久见人缺心眼
status: Long Time No See a Dim-Witted Guy ; Long Time No See, Dimwit ; Ri Jiu Jian Ren Que Xin Yan ; Quen Lâu Mới Biết Người Thiếu Tâm Cơ ; Rì Jiǔ Jiàn Rén Quē Xīn Yǎn ; 日久见人缺心眼
description:
Description :
        A story about a evil spirit exorcist religious fraud who's as good as dead, and a half-baked male celebrity struggling to become popular. When they make a deal to benefit off each other, they discover that they are waiting for an opportunity to take advantage of one another other.
